name: That Tiny Pea
description:
That Tiny Pea is a 3d Lunar Lander sim.

Land on the surface of the moon with limited fuel, then gaze upon the Earth during a moon walk.

It was made for Ludum Dare 38 https://ldjam.com/

Theme: "A Small World"

Controls:

Mouse to rotate camera

Escape to return to main menu

-Lunar Module

WASD for pitch/roll

QE to rotate

Left Shift/Left Control for thrust

X to cut thrust

F to exit when stationary

` to hide UI

-Astronaut

WASD to move
